kurd getae Goth Guti Hatti Kassite (PIE ethnonyms)
𒄖𒋾 @ 𒄖𒌅𒌝𒆠 Gutium𒆳

Guti herding mountain people utterly destroying Akkad

Terrible rulers over Sumer (not illiterate, but dark age, sabotaging mesopotamia, releasing animals, neglecting infrastructure/agrarian)

𒀭𒌓𒃶𒅅 Utu Hengal first sumerian king after Sargon and Guti rule
